body: More issues I'm fixing with my packages as I've been implementing Intel MKL and MPI where I need to explicitly pass the BLAS and LAPACK libraries to OpenFAST so that it uses the libraries Spack administers. OpenFAST also needs `hdf5+hl` since the `+hl` HDF5 variant showed up.
title: Updating OpenFAST to use explicit lapack and blas libraries from Spack.
